FeatureItem.Name: Bind Grid
FeatureItem.Description:
Data source: [DataSource], [DataMember].
Data source change notification: [DataSourceChanged].
Suppress details that don't have associated levels in the grid's structure: [{(ShowOnlyPredefinedDetails=False)}ShowOnlyPredefinedDetails].
To customize the level tree and its associated views, use the Views and View Repository links in the leftmost navigation bar.

FeatureItem.Name: Bind Columns
FeatureItem.Description:
Bind column to a field: [{goto:Columns,FieldName}Column.FieldName] property.
Create an unbound column: [{goto:Columns,UnboundType}Column.UnboundType] property, [CustomUnboundColumnData] event.

FeatureItem.Name: Cell Editing
FeatureItem.Description:
User action that switches a cell to edit mode: [OptionsBehavior.EditorShowMode] option.
Edit mode availability: - for the view: [{(OptionsBehavior.Editable=False)}OptionsBehavior.Editable] property. - for columns: [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.AllowEdit}OptionsColumn.AllowEdit], [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.ReadOnly}OptionsColumn.ReadOnly] properties. - for cells: [ShowingEditor] event.
Editing notifications: - start / finish editing: [ShownEditor], [HiddenEditor] events. - changes to edit values: [CellValueChanging], [CellValueChanged] events.

FeatureItem.Name: Data Validation
FeatureItem.Description:
Check for errors in: - cells: [ValidatingEditor] event. - rows: [ValidateRow] event.
Handle errors in: - cells: [InvalidValueException] event. - rows: [InvalidRowException] event.

FeatureItem.Name: Grid Control Settings
FeatureItem.Description:
Suppress details that don't have an associated level in the grid's structure: [{(ShowOnlyPredefinedDetails=False)}ShowOnlyPredefinedDetails].
Notifications of Zooming operations: [DefaultViewChanged] event.
Notifications of Clones being created / destroyed: [ViewRegistered], [ViewRemoved] events.

FeatureItem.Name: Grid Control Look And Feel
FeatureItem.Description:
Background image: [BackgroundImage] property.
Use the look and feel settings from the default look and feel object: [LookAndFeel.UseDefaultLookAndFeel] property.
Paint the control using the current XP theme: [LookAndFeel.UseWindowsXPTheme] property.
Other styles: [LookAndFeel.Style], [LookAndFeel.SkinName] properties.

FeatureItem.Name: View Look and Feel
FeatureItem.Description:
View look and feel: [PaintStyleName].
View border style: [BorderStyle].
By default, a view's look and feel depends upon the grid control's look and feel settings.
